text: My prayers are with the children and parents of Uvalde today as they endure a tragic incident of gun violence.
Today is election day North Texas! Polls are open from 7AM - 7PM and you can vote with a current state-issued ID.Make sure to go to the polls to make your voice heard.

Rising costs are hurting families across the country. Today I joined @RepHorsford to call on Secretary Austin to combat the effects of inflation we are seeing & help our nationâ€™s military families be able to afford essential goods while on base.

Texas Republican leaders knew our state was at risk of an undercount in the 2020 census but failed to do anything about it. As a result Texas communities will grapple with insufficient funding misallocated resources and inadequate political representation for the next decade.

Families in #TX33 have felt the pain of the infant formula shortage firsthand. That is why I am voting with @HouseDemocrats to get the FDA the resources it needs to address this shortage & help prevent it from ever happening again. #FeedOurInfants
